name: UIAccessibilityElement
desc: An element that should be accessible to users with disabilities, but that isnâ€™t accessible by default.

items.name: init(accessibilityContainer: Any)
items.desc: Creates and initializes an accessibility element to represent an item in the specified container.

items.name: var accessibilityContainer: AnyObject?
items.desc: The view that contains the accessibility element.

items.name: var isAccessibilityElement: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the item is an accessibility element an assistive application can access.

items.name: var accessibilityLabel: String?
items.desc: A string that succinctly identifies the accessibility element.

items.name: var accessibilityHint: String?
items.desc: A string that briefly describes the result of performing an action on the accessibility element.

items.name: var accessibilityValue: String?
items.desc: A string that represents the current value of the accessibility element.

items.name: var accessibilityFrame: CGRect
items.desc: The frame of the accessibility element, in screen coordinates.

items.name: var accessibilityFrameInContainerSpace: CGRect
items.desc: The frame of the accessibility element, in the coordinate space of its container view.

items.name: var accessibilityTraits: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The combination of traits that best characterize the accessibility element.
